name: Walking on a Star Unknown
description:
Walking on a Star Unknown is a cooking adventure game by Segawa made in RPG Maker 2000. It has multiple story paths, two main endings, and lots of optional content.

While traveling through space, siblings Fukuro and Eddie crash on an unfamiliar planet.
There, they learn about the Gourmate Cooking Tournament, which rewards the winner one wish.
Aiming to win and have their ship fixed, they work with the people of Calpucca to make the best food they can.
